document.name: Documentation on Wiki
document.description: Assorted documentation on our Wiki, several important HOWTO's

document.name: Developer Central
document.description: Guidelines on how to hack ScummVM. A must read for developers.

document.name: SCUMM Data File MD5 Checksums
document.description: This page lists MD5 checksums for various 'canonical' data files of SCUMM games, which can be used to identify game versions/variants.

document.name: Game data files
document.description: This page lists for many supported games which files exactly are needed by ScummVM in order to play that game.

document.name: ScummVM current areas of focus
document.description: This page is the current TODO list for ScummVM.

document.description: Cross referenced source code documentation for ScummVM, generated using Doxygen
